name: OR_IMP_AICD_MAG_USED
description: This table stores information related to the AICD - Magnet Used on Device (I IMP 56743) item.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AICD_MAG_USED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document if a magnet can be used on the device to inactivate tachycardia detection.
